Skipping install of 'raincloudplots' from a github remote, the SHA1 (b8dc7c0a) has not changed since last install.
  Use `force = TRUE` to force installation
## some data wrangling to get all the parameters together

[36m--[39m [1m[1mColumn specification[1m[22m [36m--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[39m
cols(
  X1 = [32mcol_double()[39m,
  Accuracy = [32mcol_double()[39m,
  Confidence = [32mcol_double()[39m,
  ConfidenceRT = [32mcol_double()[39m,
  Criterion = [32mcol_double()[39m,
  DecisionRT = [32mcol_double()[39m,
  HBC = [32mcol_double()[39m,
  Modality = [31mcol_character()[39m,
  Session = [31mcol_character()[39m,
  Slope = [32mcol_double()[39m,
  Subject = [31mcol_character()[39m,
  TaskDuration = [32mcol_double()[39m,
  Threshold = [32mcol_double()[39m,
  dPrime = [32mcol_double()[39m
)

[36m--[39m [1m[1mColumn specification[1m[22m [36m--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[39m
cols(
  X1 = [32mcol_double()[39m,
  mean = [32mcol_double()[39m,
  sd = [32mcol_double()[39m,
  `hdi_3%` = [32mcol_double()[39m,
  `hdi_97%` = [32mcol_double()[39m,
  mcse_mean = [32mcol_double()[39m,
  mcse_sd = [32mcol_double()[39m,
  ess_mean = [32mcol_double()[39m,
  ess_sd = [32mcol_double()[39m,
  ess_bulk = [32mcol_double()[39m,
  ess_tail = [32mcol_double()[39m,
  r_hat = [33mcol_logical()[39m,
  Subject = [31mcol_character()[39m,
  Condition = [31mcol_character()[39m
)
pivot_wider(id_cols = Subject, names_from = Condition, values_from = c("dPrime", "DecisionRT", "BayesianThreshold", "BayesianSlope", "Confidence", "Mratio"))
